channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: One of 2021’s best digital art software is 50 percent off
item.description: TwistedBrush is an app that gives you thousands of brushes and a huge array of customizable features for creating stunning art at an affordable price.

item.title: McLaren is the next big racing team to join Extreme E
item.description: McLaren Racing is joining Extreme E, giving the electric off-road league a big boost.

item.title: Make Noise Strega review: A wonderfully weird, one-of-a-kind synth
item.description: A wonderfully weird, one-of-a-kind synth for drones, noise and lo-fi effects.

item.title: Apple's colorful new iMacs are already $50 off at Amazon
item.description: Save big on Apple's latest 24-inch iMac at Amazon.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Diving into WWDC and E3
item.description: This week, Cherlynn and Devindra chat with Mat Smith about Apple's torrent of announcements from WWDC 2021 and what to expect from E3.

item.title: Watch the opening minutes of Netflix’s ‘Resident Evil: Infinite Darkness’
item.description: Netflix has released a 3-minute opening clip for 'Resident Evil: Infinite Darkness.'

item.title: ASUS ROG Strix G15 Advantage review: All AMD and A-OK
item.description: The Strix G15 Advantage Edition shows what’s possible when you pair AMD’s latest Ryzen CPUs with its powerful new Radeon 6000M graphics. It can outpage NVIDIA’s fastest mobile GPUs, so long as you’re not using ray tracing. And best of all, the G15 Advantage comes in cheaper than comparable systems.

item.title: CD Projekt Red says internal data from ransomware breach is being spread online
item.description: 'Cyberpunk 2077' developer CD Projekt has released an update on the security breach it suffered in February, stating that stolen internal data is circulating online.

item.title: The Morning After: Showing off the power of the Tesla Model S Plaid
item.description: Today’s headlines: Tesla shows off the $130,000 Model S Plaid's performance, Microsoft is making Xbox video game streaming sticks and FromSoftware, and George R.R. Martin's 'Elden Ring' arrives in January 2022.

item.title: NVIDIA to buy autonomous vehicle mapping company DeepMap
item.description: NVIDIA has acquired DeepMap, a company that makes high-definition mapping technology for self-driving cars.

item.title: NASA to land payloads on the far side of the Moon for the first time
item.description: NASA has chosen three scientific payloads under its Commercial Lunar Payload Services initiative, and two will be landing on the far side of the Moon.

item.title: Google Chrome will once again show a website's full URL
item.description: Google will now show the full URL in Chrome after admitting that the experiment "didn't move" security metrics.

item.title: UK competition regulator to supervise Google's Privacy Sandbox changes
item.description: The UK's competition regulator has agreed with Google to oversee its Privacy Sandbox changes.

item.title: Tesla shows off the $130,000 Model S Plaid's performance
item.description: Tesla delivered its first 25 Model S Plaid EVs while CEO Elon Musk detailed all the new features that give it so much extra quickness and enhanced range.

item.title: DOJ charges security exec for hacking a Georgia healthcare company in 2018
item.description: A security company executive has been charged for hacking into the Gwinnett Medical Center's network on or around September 27th, 2018.

item.title: Tune in for Tesla's Model S Plaid delivery event at 11:15 PM ET
item.description: A triple-motor Model S capable of 0 - 60 MPH in under two seconds will be unveiled at Tesla's Fremont factory tonight.

item.title: Apple AirPods Max headphones drop to their lowest price so far at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has dropped the AirPods Max price to $499 for two colors -- $50 off the regular price.

item.title: Microsoft preps for its big Windows event with an 11-minute startup sound remix
item.description: Have you ever listened to Windows startup sounds... played super slowly?

item.title: Apple hires former BMW and Faraday Future exec to EV team
item.description: Apple has hired former BMW executive Ulrich Kranz to join its automotive team.

item.title: Facebook Messenger adds custom QR codes for Facebook Pay transactions
item.description: Facebook Messenger now supports Venmo-like QR codes and personalized links for person-to-person payments with Facebook Pay.

item.title: 'Last Stop' brings its supernatural story to consoles and PC on July 22nd
item.description: 'Last Stop,' the latest project from Virginia developer Variable State, will hit consoles and PC on July 22nd.

item.title: Former Call of Duty heads are making a new game for PlayStation
item.description: Two important individuals in the history of Call of Duty have founded a new studio.

item.title: Jackbox is offering 'practice friends' to rebuild your social skills
item.description: Jackbox Games is offering the chance to hire 'practice friends' that remind you how to socialize in a post-pandemic world.

item.title: 'Evil Dead: The Game' trailer shows a brutal multiplayer battle with Deadites
item.description: Boss Team and Saber have shown the first gameplay from 'Evil Dead: The Game,' and its a brutal battle between Ash's crew and the Deadites.

item.title: Rhythm game 'A Musical Story' comes to consoles, iOS and PC this October
item.description: Part rhythm game, you’ll need to play music to unlock the memories of protagonist Gabriel.
